typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "A trustedIssuer already exists by this name"

arguments.value: A trustedIssuer already exists by this name

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "A trustedIssuer already exists by this name"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Issuer address already exists in another index"

arguments.value: Issuer address already exists in another index

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Issuer address already exists in another index"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Add the identity contract of a trusted claim issuer corresiponding
to the index provided.
Requires the index to be greater than zero.
Requires that an identity contract doesnt already exist corresponding to the index.
Only owner can call
    * @param _trustedIssuer The identity contract address of the trusted claim issuer.
@param index The desired index of the claim issuer
nodes.name: addTrustedIssuer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Removes the identity contract of a trusted claim issuer corresponding
to the index provided.
Requires the index to be greater than zero.
Requires that an identity contract exists corresponding to the index.
Only owner can call.
    * @param index The desired index of the claim issuer to be removed.
nodes.name: removeTrustedIssuer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function for getting all the trusted claim issuer indexes stored.
@return array of indexes of all the trusted claim issuer indexes stored.
nodes.name: getTrustedIssuers

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function for getting the trusted claim issuer's
identity contract address corresponding to the index provided.
Requires the provided index to have an identity contract stored.
Only owner can call.
    * @param index The index corresponding to which identity contract address is required.
    * @return Address of the identity contract address of the trusted claim issuer.
nodes.name: getTrustedIssuer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Updates the identity contract of a trusted claim issuer corresponding
to the index provided.
Requires the index to be greater than zero.
Requires that an identity contract already exists corresponding to the provided index.
Only owner can call.
    * @param index The desired index of the claim issuer to be updated.
@param _newTrustedIssuer The new identity contract address of the trusted claim issuer.
nodes.name: updateIssuerContract
checkIsTrustedIssuer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Updates the identity contract of a trusted claim issuer corresponding
to the index provided.
Requires the index to be greater than zero.
Requires that an identity contract already exists corresponding to the provided index.
Only owner can call.
    * @param index The desired index of the claim issuer to be updated.
@param _newTrustedIssuer The new identity contract address of the trusted claim issuer.
nodes.name: updateIssuerContract
checkIsTrustedIssuer

params._trustedIssuer: The identity contract address of the trusted claim issuer.
params.index: The desired index of the claim issuer

params._trustedIssuerIdentity: The given address will be check

params.index: The index corresponding to which identity contract address is required.

getTrustedIssuer(uint256).return: Address of the identity contract address of the trusted claim issuer.

getTrustedIssuers().return: array of indexes of all the trusted claim issuer indexes stored.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.index: The desired index of the claim issuer to be removed.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._newTrustedIssuer: The new identity contract address of the trusted claim issuer.
params.index: The desired index of the claim issuer to be updated.

addTrustedIssuer(address,uint256).notice: Add the identity contract of a trusted claim issuer corresiponding to the index provided. Requires the index to be greater than zero. Requires that an identity contract doesnt already exist corresponding to the index. Only owner can call

checkIsTrustedIssuer(address).notice: Check the given address is identity contract of a trusted claim issuer or not

getTrustedIssuer(uint256).notice: Function for getting the trusted claim issuer's identity contract address corresponding to the index provided. Requires the provided index to have an identity contract stored. Only owner can call.

getTrustedIssuers().notice: Function for getting all the trusted claim issuer indexes stored.

removeTrustedIssuer(uint256).notice: Removes the identity contract of a trusted claim issuer corresponding to the index provided. Requires the index to be greater than zero. Requires that an identity contract exists corresponding to the index. Only owner can call.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

updateIssuerContract(uint256,address).notice: Updates the identity contract of a trusted claim issuer corresponding to the index provided. Requires the index to be greater than zero. Requires that an identity contract already exists corresponding to the provided index. Only owner can call.
